content: knitted over-sized jacket in drops kid-silk the piece is worked top down with raglan v-neck lace pattern and wide sleeves pattern ks-223 yarn group a **sizes** xs - s - m - l - xl - xxl **yarn** drops kid-silk from garnstudio 100-125-125-150-150-175 g colour 06 blue mist **buttons** drops buttons no 521 5 buttons for all sizes **needles** drops circular needle size 3 5 mm length 40 cm and 80 cm drops circular needle size 2 5 mm length 80 cm drops double pointed needles size 3 5 mm drops double pointed needles size 2 5 mm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need 80 cm circular needle in each size **knitting gauge** 21 stitches in width and 28 row in height with lace pattern = 10 x 10 cm
